availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Oldham County, Kentucky, and Carroll County, Kentucky, farmer and physician. Kentucky native. Married Virginia E. Meade. Farmer in Oldham County in 1860. Physician in Carroll County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules,
Kentucky, Oldham County, Unnamed District, p. 57; _Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866 NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768, Roll 15, Kentucky, Collection District No. 4, Division No. 1, 1863, p. 5 (Accessed via ancestry.com); Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Carrollton, p. 18; _Find A Grave, "Prentis Meade (1832-1899)," Memorial #35350243, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/35350243 (accessed November 15, 2015).
